snippet: Investors are underestimating Hyundai Motor Co's ability to turn around itself and its stock after rocky period, according to Barron's in its January 27 edition....

headline.print_headline: New Models, More Production Could Boost Hyundai Shares: Barron's
headline.main: New Models, More Production Could Boost Hyundai Shares: Barron's

lead_paragraph: Investors are underestimating Hyundai Motor Co's ability to turn around itself and its stock after rocky period, according to Barron's in its January 27 edition.
